bio: I am a second year university student, my main interests are about web applications, APIs and bash scripting on OS Linux, also using orchestrators like Kubernetes. I architect and manage Cloud infrastructures on AWS. I’m applying DevOps for automating software test, deploy and release. I use Python, Perl, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and Bash with Apache2 or Nginx webservers, Gunicorn and Plack appservers, Flask and Dancer2 MVC Web Frameworks, PostgreSQL, MongoDB or mySQL DBMS. I have expertise on hardware and embedded solutions, mainly Raspberry Pi and Arduino.. I follow ITIL4 best practices and Agile Methodologies. After several years as an IT student, I’m always willing to learn more.
